title: Looking for players to have fun with, I'm not that bad to play with xD
body:
Just looking for people to play with and to have fun with, I can't go serious in any match unless I go rank haha, so anyone interested in playing with a silver noob :3 
I play a ton of Aram lol my friends hate it so none of them wanna play with me (some friends they are right) I currently have 1k win in Aram and like only 500 win in normals
I'm pre friendly if I say so myself xD I think maybe (don't judge me ! Idk how else to look for players to have fun with, well I do but I choose to pick this way :D) Add me if you want looking forward to meeting you all :D

replies.body: Add me, I'd love to play ARAM's with you :]

Yes but do you lag ?:P

\Throw me an add; my partner and I alternate between ARAM's and normals. :P
